comment: Ended up too sweet even at 1.019. Would probably go less or no corn sugar on this one.

You should use 20 % of sugar, do a 2 step mash (145 F for 60 minutes and 154 F for 30 minutes), and ferment with a more attenuative yeast, like French Saison, or add champagne yeast (Wyeast 4021) a couple days after primary started ;)
